entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1 except 7 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 1 except 7 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
